_description: On the Four Cardinal Virtues — five couplets

BLHar1706.First Lines: Be ryȝtwys man what euer be tydeTo god and man on euery syde…
BLHar1706.Last Lines: …þese ben foure vertues cardinalþat schulde rewle men boþ grete and smale
BLHar1706.Note:
With Latin names of the virtues in rubric in right margin beside lines 1, 3, 5,
                    7.
BLHar1706.Attributed Title: Quatuor virtutes cardinales (rubric above first line, f. 208)
BLHar1706.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 1706.

BLHar1706.Editions:
Hirsh,  John C. 
             “Prayer and Meditation in Late Mediaeval England: MS. Bodley
                789.” 
             Medium Ævum
         48 (1979): 55-66: 63-4.
